TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The applicant is a former employee ( merchandise expert ) of ORG ( Маріупольський торговий відділ Воєнторгу ) .

On DATE the ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) ordered ORG of ORG situated in GPE ( “ the Military Trade Department ” ; Управління воєнної торгівлі ORG оперативного командування PERSON ) to pay the applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL in salary arrears . The decision became final and binding on DATE .
On DATE ORG LOC of GPE instituted the enforcement proceedings .
The judgment at issue was not enforced in due time because of the lack of debtor ’s funds .
During DATE the major part of the debt was transferred to the applicant ’s bank account .
The judgment of DATE was enforced in full on DATE .
In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings against ORG seeking to receive compensation for delay in the enforcement of the judgment given in her favour and for loss of value of the initial award .
On DATE ORG found no fault by the respondent and rejected the applicant ’s claim .
On DATE and DATE ORG and ORG , respectively , upheld this decision .
